H0.text: Which builder of steam engines formed a successful partnership with Matthew Boulton. Richard Trevithick

H1.text: Which builder of steam engines formed a successful partnership with Matthew Boulton. Jonathan Hornblower

H2.text: Which builder of steam engines formed a successful partnership with Matthew Boulton. Arthur Woolf

H3.text: Which builder of steam engines formed a successful partnership with Matthew Boulton. James Watt

A4.text: Watt and Boulton formed a hugely successful partnership, Boulton and Watt, which lasted for the next 25 years.

A5.text: The new firm of Boulton and Watt was eventually highly successful and Watt became a wealthy man.
